description.en-US:
Minecraft Skin Editor, draw directly on the player. Nova Skin is a tool to edit skin for the popular game minecraft. Easy to use, just select colors or gradient tools and draw on the player. Features:
  • Just click and draw over a player skin.
  • You can zoom, rotate and move by pressing shift+mouse or using on screen tools.
  • Load skins from your files (load button or drag & drop), from a url or copy other player skin
  • Multiple color slots, gradient lines, rectangles, ellipsis and eye dropper.
  • Middle click or spacebar performs the same eye dropper action.
  • Flood fill tool.
  • Color rotator to change the skin colors.
  • Multiple layers: add, remove, combine.
  • Show/Hide grid and parts. (to draw on head hide the hat)
  • Undo!
  • The skin can be saved as a png image, uploaded direct to minecraft.net
  • You can also share the links.
  • Take screenshots with your skin in different poses, holding an item.
  • The skins previews are rendered with anti-aliasing in a transparent background.
  • Embeddable (copy&paste html code) to display a animated, rotatable skin preview for your blog or own site.
  • Gallery with latest skins.
  • Login to save skins.
  • Full 2D editor (pixlr) integration.
Tips:
    Nova skin cache resources to work offline.
  • Double click fill the entire area.
  • Right click acts as an eraser.
  • Space bar, middle click acts as the color picker.
  • Drag files from your computer and drop on novaskin. They'll be loaded.
  • Edit skins with Gimp, Photoshop or any other external image editor. When the file is saved, novaskin automatically reloads the changes. Useful from real time preview. Use a professional editor, preview, make changes, save online and get screenshots with novaskin.
  • Type a player name at name/url field to load the player skin.
  • Login, novaskin will remember you skins creations. When you save a new skin, it will be added to your collection.
  • All skins saved online at gallery are public. When you save a skin you get:
    - Short link to your skin (novask.in/id) - The skin will be uploaded to imgur. - Forum BBCode (with screenshot, instant aply link) to share your skin with the community. - HTML code to embed the 3D skin preview in you own site. - The skin is uploaded to the online gallery. If you do not your skin to be public, use the aplly to minecraft button, the skin will not be saved or shown on public gallery. Or click save, right click the flat skin image and choose save image as and close the save window.
  • Check the randomize color check-box to avoid flat colored skins.
  • Change the background to test the skin in different situations, try to use soft colors, in game they will look better.
  • Use the flip bottom faces button to fix skins created before 1.0.
description.pt-BR: Editor de skins para minecraft. Desenhe direto no personagem! Nova Skin é um editor de skins para minecraft. Fácil de usar, selecione algumas cores ou use as ferramentas gradiente e desenhe direto no personagem. Funcionalidades: Rotacione, afaste, aproxime mova o personagem com shift+mouse ou use os atalhos na tela. Carregue skins do seu computador pelo botão abrir ou arraste e solte os arquivos no editor. Carregue o skin de alguém escrevendo o nome do jogador e tecle enter. Vários slots de cores, linha, retângulos e círculos com efeitos em degradê. Clique com o botão do meio do mouse, pressione a barra de espaços ou use a ferramenta para copiar uma cor do skin. Ferramenta balde de tinta para preencher uma área com cores similares. Filtros para mudar facilmente as cores de um skin. Suporte a várias camadas, adicionar, remover e combinar. Exibe e esconde partes específicas. (Esconda o chapéu para desenhar na cabeça) Importe skins e partes de skins de sites externos. Desfazer! (ctrl+z) O skin pode ser salvo como uma imagem png ou enviado diretamente para o minecraft.net. Compartilhe skins usando os links gerados pelo editor. Capture imagens do seu skin em diferentes poses e segurando um item. As imagens são geradas com fundo transparente e suavização de serrilhado nas bordas. Copie o código html gerado ao salvar, para incluir uma prévia animada do seu skin no seu site. Galeria com todos os skins online. Login. Integração com o pixlr, um editor 2D com funcionalidades mais avançadas.
